label: 大般若経
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Skt. Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra.　Six hundred fascicles. A long Mahayana work on the illusory nature of worldly phenomena. Considered a protection against evil.
